transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, hi ma'am.
Customer: Namaskar sir.
Executive: Namaskar ma'am, kaise hain aap ma'am?
Customer: Haan ji badhiya. Sir, actually meri Raman ji se baat hui thi is bare mein, unhone kaha tha ye wala.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To unka kehna ye tha ki mujhe koi bhi positive output nahi mil raha usse aur jaise usme inquiry to karte hain log but buy nahi karta koi bhi.
Executive: Hmm. To ma'am us field mein maine aapko bataya tha na ki jiski digital lead aati hai, AI system based hai. To aapke jitne lead aate hain.
Customer: Sorry, sorry to interrupt. Sir, aapki na aawaz mere ko clear nahi aa rahi hai, thoda.
Executive: No worries ma'am, abhi clear aa rahi hai meri voice?
Customer: Haan, abhi sahi hai.
Executive: Haan. Ma'am jaise ki maine aapko bataya tha na ki aapke AI system se lead generate hoti hai. To aap jitna bhi aapka recent activity hoti hai uske base pe aapko lead milti hai ma'am. To similarly ma'am aapka ek feedback ka option aata hai har ek lead pe. Aap jaise bhi feedback share karna hai na, isi tarike se ma'am aapki har ek lead ka ek feedback ka option aata hai. Either the lead is relevant or not. Wo ma'am jaise hi hum lead manager pe jaate hain na, jaise lead hamari consume hoti hai. To wo hame lead manager pe properly dikhta hai ma'am waha. To lead manager se ma'am hum log properly waha se share kar paate hain ki wo lead hamari relevant hai ya nahi hai. Relevancy hai ya nahi hai. To waha ma'am likha hota hai clearly is this valid relevant ya fir is this valid useful. To thumbs up and thumbs down ka option hota hai ma'am waha. Waha se thumbs up pe click karte hain to waha se relevancy pata chalti hai ki ye relevant hai. Aur ma'am thumbs down pe click karte hain to waha se not relevancy pata chalti hai. Wo kyun not relevant hai? Client reachable nahi hai ya fir client fake hai ya client ne jo hai bol diya hai ki aapke orders wagera nahi le pa raha hai ya fir ma'am koi other option hota hai to aap other option pe jaise click karte ho, waha niche comment box aata hai. To comment box mein aapna feedback share kar sakte ho waha se. To jisse ki ma'am hum logo ko leads ka jitna bhi hai aapka dissatisfaction, waha se pata chalega to hum aage ki leads ko isse better quantity mein ya better conversion ke sath aapko bhej payenge.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Right ma'am aapke kuch products... Lead manager hai us pe hi hai feedback ka option. Aap ye bol rahe hain.
Executive: Ya ma'am main, main link share karta hu aapko, main proper aapko guide karta hu. Kuch products bhi ma'am aapne negative mark kara hua hai matlab out of stock mark kara hua hai. Main jaanta hu ma'am reason iska?
Customer: Ye product hai aapke... Hamare catalog mein sir, hamare catalog mein?
Executive: Ji ma'am.
Customer: Uh.
Executive: Aapke product hai ma'am ye Garg Acid and Capsule 100mg and Livicid 300 Urodexic Acid tablets. Ye aapne negative mark kara hua hai ma'am.
Customer: Ye sir ne kiya hoga sir.
Executive: Isme deal nahi karte ho?
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Products mein deal nahi kar rahe ho kya ma'am?
Customer: Uh, maybe product aana band ho gaya ho.
Executive: Ye to but aapke catalog pe to already product laga hai na. Agar aap isme nahi kar rahe ho to ma'am isko waha se hata dijiye. Usko inactive karke waha se remove kar dijiye. Haan. Okay. To jiske aage jitni bhi dikkat aayegi to us tarike ki leads aapko waise bhi nahi aayenge na ma'am.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Main link share kar raha hu, koi nahi aap join kariye. Main aapko guide karta hu kis tarike se aapko karna hai, hai na? Ek minute call pe rahiye, main link share kar raha hu aapko.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Link ma'am aapke paas jayega sir ke paas jayega?
Customer: Sir main hi attend kar leti hu. Sir busy hai, busy hai aaj.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi hai ma'am, aap kar lijiye. Aise sir ko aapko call aaya hoga, aap hi kar lijiye.
Customer: Haan ji ma'am?
Customer: Uh, link WhatsApp pe aaya sir?
Executive: Ma'am mail pe gaya hoga.
Customer: IndiaMART se?
Executive: Haan haan, mail pe aaya hoga.
Executive: Sanjeev.chawdhary@indiamart.com ke naam se kuch mail gaya hoga ma'am. Check kariye sir.
Customer: To uh, ye to fir sir hi dekhenge. Mere mein.
Executive: Kya ma'am?
Customer: Ye Praveen Grover? Nahi.
Executive: Ma'am Sanjeev.chawdhary@indiamart.com ke naam se aapke paas mail gaya hoga abhi.
Customer: Mail ID batao ma'am.
Customer: Sir ye na, ye to sir ke paas hi jayega sir. Mail ID to unhi ki hai kyunki.
Executive: Ramanmedicos78@gmail.com ke naam se.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji sir ye unhe wohi karenge.
Executive: To wohi karenge?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ma'am abhi aapke paas fir main dusra aap mere ko apna mail ID bataiye jaise ki main mail add kar dunga iske andar aapka.
Customer: Mera hai nahi na sir, mera mail ID bana hi nahi hai.
Executive: To ma'am us din bhi to maine karaya tha na to aapke paas mail hi gaya tha, yahi wala mail gaya tha.
Customer: Wo unki mail se hi kiya tha. Wo mere bete ne kar diya tha, unki mail pe kiya tha humne.
Executive: Abhi ho sakta hai ma'am?
Customer: Uh, sir aapki main unse hi baat karwa du. Unko un unko satisfaction honi chahiye, unko pata lagna chahiye ki kya chal raha hai.
Executive: Haan ma'am main to bol raha hu aap meri unse baat kara dijiye, main unse bhi kar sakta hu.
Customer: Abhi nahi ho payegi but sir main abhi aap karke dekh lo ek baar call agar free ho gaye honge to aapki pick kar lenge wo call. Sorry sir.
Executive: Mere ko 5:30 baje to unhone bola tha, main ek baar call kar leta hu unko.
Customer: Haan ji please sir unhi ko kar lo kyunki main ghar pe hi hu aaj full day na.
Executive: Agar wo nahi ho paate hain to fir main aapko WhatsApp pe link share karke kara deta hu.
Customer: Sir aisa aisa karna aap fir main unko call karti hu ki wo thodi der aapse baat kar lenge, attend kar lenge call.
Executive: Haan ya ya bilkul.
Customer: Theek hai sir, thank you.
Executive: Okay ma'am. Thank you.
Executive: Ma'am.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving positive output from IndiaMART.

- Inquiries received, but no purchases made.

- Wants to provide feedback on leads.

- Products marked as 'out of stock' in catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive explained AI-based lead generation system.

- Executive explained feedback option for each lead.

- Executive offered to share a link for guidance.

- Executive offered to call the customer's husband.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call customer's husband.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, catalog, feedback, relevancy
